title: Is it bad to listen music while eating? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well That Probably Depends I Wouldn’t Recommend Green Day Or Black Sabbath As Hard Rock/Heavy Metal Can Cause Indigestion I Also Wouldn’t Recommend Songs That Mention Gross Stuff Like Turning People Into Meat Pies So The Sweeney Todd Soundtrack Is Also Out I Also Would Avoid A Songs Like The Real Slim Shady Where Someone Mentions Doing Gross Things To Food i.e. Gonna Get A Job At Burger King Spitting On Your Onion Rings But If We’re Talking Jazz Or Classical Which Are Relaxing They Might Help Aid Digestion

no, just don’t listen to music that talks about eating stuff like.. you know.. people. if you listen to music while eating i would recommend sweet songs (maybe in a language you don’t speak so you won’t be grossed out?) i do this action all the time, and the music i listen to has always been in Russian. i do not speak this language, but i understand some, so i can be fine listening to it while eating.
